name: Yuegui: Throwing Mode
description:
End Phase: Deal 1 Dendro DMG, heal the character on your team that has taken the most damage for 1 HP: If there is only 1 Usage(s) remaining, then the healing provided and DMG dealt by this skill are both increased by 1.
Usage(s): 2
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> Deal 1 $[K107], heal the character on your team that has taken the most damage for 1 HP: If there is only 1 $[K3] remaining, then the healing provided and DMG dealt by this skill are both increased by 1.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 2</color>
